TopicTitle: International construction ISS in Kerbal orbit.

Articles.Content:
OrbitusII

Just send me mail in PM... ))))
No more corrupted file! I tested an untextured MPLM in KSP and it matches up with the ISS CBM! It's goin well!
Any pictures?

Any pictures?

No, Yogui has the most recent version for edits.

Actually, picture, one only, from Yogui.

EDIT:

Yogui, you forgot to send me that part file with the mesh. I'll compile it and part.cfg it.

Actually, picture, one only, from Yogui.

EDIT:

Yogui, you forgot to send me that part file with the mesh. I'll compile it and part.cfg it.

Looks awesome!

I can't wait for this mod to be finished.
This is going to be one Epic Mod
All autors please send me fresh models
bobcat, did you get the mplm with the dev file I sent you yesterday, maybe the day before?

Bobcat, have you had a glitch between docking PMA and Buran? This mod is blocking my ability to dock. It worked fine, then I finished adding every part, and now shuttles, soyuz, progress, none of them dock.
MPLM sent to bobcat, and recieved.

Bobcat, have you had a glitch between docking PMA and Buran? This mod is blocking my ability to dock. It worked fine, then I finished adding every part, and now shuttles, soyuz, progress, none of them dock.

I have some problem.

Im try find wrong part.

Red error spaming console.
I sent you a dev folder with the .dae and textures and normal map.
Nice Orion! I look forward to getting to play with it!

I do not see any reason to pull on, so releasing this project in the form in which it is now.

At the moment a lot of flaws and bugs, the details are not balanced, not on some textures, but this is our starting point.

If you think you have found a bug, you know that it is better to fix or have a proposal to amend the details, write freely in this thread.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/0-19-x-iss-space-station-pack-ver-0-03/

Edited May 17, 2013 by BobCat
We will do our best!

I think you may have linked to the wrong page BobCat. It says that it I am not authorized to view page. I can however see the ISS pack on the front page of the spaceport.

Anyway, time for a clean ksp install, its starting to get a bit unstable so I may have to drop some things to get this in. The problem with so many great modders is that there are so many great mods xD the poor loading system just cant handle the amount of mods that I throw at it

EDIT:

I should probably say thank you to everyone who made this mod
aw Comeon bobcat
Saw the pack on the spaceport, will test later, thanks guys for the all the hardwork
Fix for the MPLM! Bobcat, I forgot to update the dev folder you used, so the collider isn't there, here's the fix with the collider. http://www./?8pv0of4fj70dql4

I might have a slight problem to report. I am trying to assemble the ISS in the SPH (just to get an idea of how everything is going to fit together, and I cannot get the side of the FCB that docks to the PMA to attach to anything. I can attach one of the mir ports to it, but it just wont snap to anything, its almost as if the node isnt there

Excellent work for everyone involved, just assembled the ISS in the Space Plane Hanger but I can't find the Japanese module, other than that it looks absalutley brilliant.

EDIT: Found it, thanks.

Edited May 17, 2013 by lpam
JEM is in Structural Tab. And Mir Docking Probe, the Probe Core, is necessary.
